text: Marcel Mauron (25 March 1929 - 21 January 2022) was a Swiss footballer and manager. He played as a forward. He played for clubs such as Young Fellows Juventus, La Chaux-de-Fonds, Servette, Neuch√¢tel Xamax and Grenchen. He also played for Switzerland at the 1954 FIFA World Cup. Mauron died on 21 January 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:Swiss football managers Category:Swiss footballers Category:Sportspeople from Geneva
